item.title: Re: Storm Favor question
item.content:encoded:
Neither. It just flat out drops the Kaiju's HP. No hits, no T3 damage, nothing.

It must be said, though, that many kages reward the use of favors on especially hard Kaiju with spare drops, but there's nothing coded in.

item.title: Storm Favor question
item.content:encoded: If you use your favor to lower a kaijus health does that mean you are guaranteed a monster drop or does it count as a certain number of hits?
